column2: ChIP-Seq for histone modifications (H3K4me3, H3K4me1, H3K27ac, H3K27me3, H3K36me3) and Pol2

column6: XS Est: Aug 2017; 1st bio rep submitted, second in progress
column7: HFF 2nd biological replicate: August 2017; ESC: August 2017; DE: within 6 months dependent on establishment of diff protocol.

column9: Our goal will be to collect single locus time dynamics data. The generated data will consist of X,Y(t) vectors of length ~1000, sampled on second to minute timescales. For each experiment, we will also be sampling a "simple" housekeeping locus (info soon), so for each cell there will be multiple data vectors (e.g. 2 each MUC4 and Simple). OPEN QUESTION - use of Rho/ROCK inhibitor in "Standard H1" protocol- we would prefer not use inhibitor since it interfers with cell dynamics.
